title: I won a Ranked game but didn't get the lp and ip for it.
body:
I didn't get any ip or lp for a ranked game I won in my provisionals which can completely affect my ranking and want this changed, there is proof in my match history, if you check it says I'm in 7/10 placements but i have 8 ranked matches played.

I won a ranked game, then after I won the game didn't do the stats screen so I tried reconnecting but didn't let me which turned out to be a bug the same day (which is today 9/21/2017) the server status said people who played a match in 10:30 am would have some problems. When I logged back in the match said it was played (which we did it was a full match) but I didn't get ANY  ip, or lp for ranked and this was my ranked Provisionals game, it was suppose to be my 8th but it says I only played 7 EVEN though it's recorded in my match history a FULL game was played. Please give me the lp, and ip for the match I worked HARD to win. This has directly affected my ranked placements and is affecting my time which I had to wait for hours also for the client to finally be fixed. I am providing the link too so you can see, it was the Corki game I played in the set of ranked games.

replies.body: This all sounds like you might have had some problems with a ghost game as well. Op.gg isn't our official matchmaking stat site, so that data can often be pretty incorrect. Most likely, the match hasn't been properly recorded to our servers which is why it looks like you've only played 7 matches and why you haven't received the IP/LP. After enough time that match should be recorded to our servers and you'll be able to see those stats.
